text: Hannah Baker's story was just one side of ` ` 13 Reasons Why.'' Netflix Warning : Minor spoilers ahead for the second season of ` ` 13 Reasons Why.'' Netflix's hit series ` ` 13 Reasons Why'' will return with a second season on May 18. The first season of this controversial series explored the suicide of high school student Hannah Baker and the impact of her choice on a small town community. Hannah left behind 13 tapes explaining the precisely how various peers and adults had impacted her life and ultimately contributed to her choice to take her own life. There will be 13 new episodes on the second season, but no more cassette tapes this time around. According to the season two synopsis, polaroids will take the place of cassettes.
